channel.title: Reading data from a file?
channel.description: I know how to write data into a text file, i just dont know how to read it and turn whatever you read into a String/ int. I know its something to do with BufferedReader, but i cant seem to get it working. Any help is appreciated, thanks :)[br][size=1]Posted at: September 06, 2006, 03:06:02 PM[/size][hr]anyone? :(

I know how to write data into a text file, i just dont know how to read it and turn whatever you read into a String/ int.
